reviews.text: Very beautiful and grand temple courtyard, panoramic attractive statue of Sanwalia Seth.

Sawariya Seth Temple
This is amazing temple
It's very nice place to visit
The place for peace of mind and soul... There is Beautiful temple and unique construction.  calm garden place for many programs like Holi. Sawariya g blessing for all.. Bolo hare krishna hare Rama 🙏

beautiful architecture must see once in life.

places_with_reviews.name: Rajghat
places_with_reviews.address: 3VGQ+96H, Kukshi-Barwani Hwy, Kukra, Madhya Pradesh 451551, India

reviews.text: Beautiful place to visit with family and friends. People worship maa narmada river. It is religious place, please maintain dignity of this place. Take care of children near river ghat.

This is holi place , Rajghat : the bank of river Narmada, situated 5km from Barwani district HQ.
Residents also call it "Maa Narmda " , "Maa Rewa" due to omni presence in this region.For drinking water , Farming , every kind of water need people are dependent on river Narmada.
sardar sarovar dam is made in gujrat, near kevadiya because of that back water is there on this ghat (bank).
Every Evening is filled with aarti (worship) of Maa Narmda , which creates so spiritual and peaceful environment.

Most peaceful place. Maa Narmade Gives a soothing vibes
Love this place.
Would go some other time will share more pics.
Probably in next few months.

Original ghat has gone under back water of dam on Narmada River.
Now the ghat water is muddy. Water is not clean to take bath of Narmada river water.
All devotees who do Narmada parikrama visit this ghat and take bath.parikramavasi perform puja at ghat.
Peaceful and beautiful 👌👌 Amazing expanse of Ma Narmada in all her might 🙏🙏 Don't miss the boat ride

places_with_reviews.name: Maa Shri Vashno Devi Mandir - Barwani District, Madhya Pradesh, India

reviews.text: One of the best place to visit in evening in barwani
it is at height and have a b'ful view of whole barwani from there. Also having cave inside which mata vaishnodevi is residing.
Very beautiful temple of barwani dist. This is the first temple of ma vaishno devi in Barwani.

very peace full place.
must visit place in barwani city.

places_with_reviews.name: Tir Gola Memorial
places_with_reviews.address: North Avenue, Park Avenue, Barwani, Madhya Pradesh 451551, India

reviews.text: Old people from barwani says the king and queen of barwani was buried here after death and people made a tir and gola on their tomb on their remembrance.

It's not tir gola
It's chhi(छि) gola
People doing potty around them
Most popular place in barwani

Located front of Sagar Vilas Palace and was built in the memory of late son of Raja Ranjit Singh.
This place is not at all maintained.

Fun fact :
Before Independence Barwani was known as 'The Paris of Nimar'

This monument looks like a teer (arrow) & gola (sphere). It is built by Rana Devisingh and It was built in the memory of his brother Udaysingh.
This place is situated on Hill top exact opposite to Sagar Vilas palace.

places_with_reviews.name: SIDDHESHWAR MAHADEV TEMPLE सिद्धेश्वर महादेव मंदिर
places_with_reviews.address: 2VRX+Q6Q, Kukshi-Barwani Hwy, Barwani, Madhya Pradesh 451551, India

reviews.text: Perfect management for Parikrama vasi & great food...

Extremely peaceful and prominence (प्रसिद्ध) Shiva temple situated near Holy Narmada river, where you can meditate in a green surrounding and temple's management provide free meal to the people on Narmada Parikrama.
Beautiful temple.
Each Narmada Parikramavasi's middle junction point, beautiful place.
Wonderful place
